discourse_list.title: Where can i nominate for round 2?

content.content: Where can i nominate for round 2?

You can nominate a project in one of those links, depending on the topic      Infrastructure & Dependencies nominations for RPGF2 RetroPGF   Infrastructure & Dependencies nominations for RetroPGF2 This is the thread to nominate projects for the Infrastructure and dependencies category of RetroPGF round 2. Please familiarize yourself with the Nominations process for RetroPGF round 2.    Overview of Timelines  Project nominations: Jan 17 19:00 GMT - Jan 31 19:00 GMT Final project opt-in deadline: Feb 7 Voting: Feb 21 - March 7   [image]  Scope of this round RetroPGF round 2 is dedicated to projects …         Tooling & Utilities nominations for RPGF2 RetroPGF   Tooling & Utilities nominations for RetroPGF2 This is the thread to nominate projects for the Tooling and Utilities category of RetroPGF round 2. Please familiarize yourself with the Nominations process for RetroPGF round 2.    Overview of Timelines  Project nominations: Jan 17 19:00 GMT - Jan 31 19:00 GMT Final project opt-in deadline: Feb 7 Voting: Feb 21 - March 7   [image]  Scope of this round RetroPGF round 2 is dedicated to projects that support develop…         Education nominations for RPGF2 RetroPGF   Education nominations for RetroPGF2 This is the thread to nominate projects for the Education category of RetroPGF round 2. Please familiarize yourself with the Nominations process for RetroPGF round 2.    Overview of Timelines  Project nominations: Jan 17 19:00 GMT - Jan 31 19:00 GMT Final project opt-in deadline: Feb 7 Voting: Feb 21 - March 7   [image]  Scope of this round RetroPGF round 2 is dedicated to projects that support development and usage of the …

projects name**: MUX Protocol   description .   MUX Leveraged Trading Protocol - A decentralized leveraged trading protocol that offers zero price impact trading, , no counterparty risks for traders and an optimized on-chain trading experience. A sub-protocol in the MUX protocol suite that automatically selects the most suitable liquidity route and minimizes the composite cost for traders while meeting the needs of opening positions   website   mux.network    MUX｜Leveraged Trading with Zero Price Impact and Universal Liquidity Trade crypto on the MUX protocol with zero price impact, up to 100x leverage and no counterparty risks.         GitHub    GitHub - mux-world/mux-protocol Contribute to mux-world/mux-protocol development by creating an account on GitHub.      https://twitter.com/muxprotocol
The OP gov forum nomination time period has already passed. There is a 2nd form now for all those who have nominations on the forums posted above.
